brasequip.description: Website developed for Brasequip using the RAD methodology for prototyping. The project aims to improve SEO, promote the company and its services, and facilitate customer contact.
brasequip.title: Brasequip

fearAndHunger.description: Development of a web-based MMORPG aimed at applying and expanding knowledge in relational databases. Project for the Database 1 course.
fearAndHunger.title: Fear & Hunger

guiaUnB.description: Mobile application developed to inform students at the University of BrasÃ­lia (UnB) about their rights as students. Project for the Software Development Methods course.
guiaUnB.title: UnB Guide

iucai.title: IUCAI

mec.description: Website developed for an MEC consultant, aimed at assisting in the calculation of indicators for public education studies across Brazil.
mec.title: MEC consultant

minamualanon.description: Website created for the social project, focused on promoting its actions and supporting menstruation education in SÃ£o TomÃ© and PrÃ­ncipe.

echoeasy.description: Mobile app and web platform designed to centralize the client's (Echocardiographer) original content, streamlining the diagnosis of various cardiovascular diseases through echocardiography.
echoeasy.title: Echoeasy

songz.description: Songz is a project developed for the Algorithms Design course, aimed at exploring graph theory concepts applied to a music recommendation system.
songz.title: Songz

sportickets.title: Sportickets

rafaela.description: Website developed for Bartender, aimed at promoting her services and facilitating customer contact, with the unique feature of offering personalized menus for each event.
rafaela.title: Rafaela Pedroza

skillsData.bootstrap: Bootstrap is a popular CSS framework for developing responsive and mobile-first websites. It provides a collection of pre-designed components and utilities, making it easier to design and customize web interfaces
skillsData.docker: Docker is a platform for developing, shipping, and running applications in containers. It simplifies the process of deploying applications by packaging them with all their dependencies, ensuring consistency across different environments
skillsData.express: Express.js is a minimal and flexible Node.js web application framework that provides a robust set of features for building web and mobile applications. It is known for its simplicity and ease of use in creating server-side applications
skillsData.figma: Figma is a web-based design tool used for UI/UX design, prototyping, and collaboration. It allows multiple designers to work on the same project simultaneously and offers a range of design and prototyping features
skillsData.flutter: Flutter is an open-source UI toolkit from Google. It allows the creation of native apps for mobile, web, and desktop from a single codebase, offering fast development and expressive UI components
skillsData.javascript: JavaScript is a versatile programming language primarily used for creating interactive and dynamic content on the web. It is an essential technology for front-end development and is also used in server-side development with environments like Node.js
skillsData.jest: Jest is a delightful JavaScript testing framework with a focus on simplicity. It provides a great developer experience with features like zero configuration, snapshot testing, and an extensive API for testing JavaScript applications
skillsData.mongo: MongoDB is a NoSQL database known for its flexibility and scalability. It stores data in a JSON-like format, allowing for dynamic schemas and easy integration with applications that require fast and iterative development
skillsData.nest: Nest.js is a progressive Node.js framework for building efficient, reliable, and scalable server-side applications. It uses TypeScript by default and is heavily inspired by Angular, promoting the use of modular architecture and decorators
skillsData.node: Node.js is an open-source JavaScript runtime environment for executing code on the server side. It is ideal for building scalable, high-performance network applications using an event-driven, non-blocking architecture
skillsData.postgree: PostgreSQL is a powerful, open-source object-relational database system known for its robustness, extensibility, and compliance with SQL standards. It supports advanced data types and performance optimization features
skillsData.react: React.js is a JavaScript library for building user interfaces. It allows creating reusable components, managing state, and rendering changes dynamically, simplifying the development of complex, high-performance web applications
skillsData.styled: Styled Components is a library for React and React Native that allows developers to use component-level styles in their applications. It utilizes tagged template literals to style components efficiently and promotes modular CSS
skillsData.tailwind: Tailwind CSS is a utility-first CSS framework that provides low-level utility classes to build custom designs without leaving the HTML file. It allows for rapid UI development with a highly customizable configuration
skillsData.typescript: TypeScript is a typed superset of JavaScript that compiles to plain JavaScript. It offers static type-checking, which helps in identifying errors during development, and enhances code quality and maintainability
